tachyon.heartbeat

Class HeartbeatScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.heartbeat.HeartbeatScheduler

  • public final class HeartbeatScheduler
extends Object
    This class can be used for controlling heartbeat execution.

        public static void addTimer(ScheduledTimer timer)

        timer - a timer to add to the scheduler

        public static void removeTimer(ScheduledTimer timer)

      • getThreadNames

        public static Set<String> getThreadNames()
        Returns:
        the set of threads present in the scheduler

      • schedule

        public static void schedule(String threadName)
        Schedules execution of a heartbeat for the given thread.
        Parameters:
        threadName - a name of the thread for which heartbeat is to be executed

      • await

        public static void await(String name)
                  throws InterruptedException
        Waits until the given thread can be executed.
        Parameters:
        name - a name of the thread to wait for
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • await

        public static boolean await(String name,
            long time,
            TimeUnit unit)
                     throws InterruptedException
        Waits until the given thread can be executed or the given timeout expires.
        Parameters:
        name - a name of the thread to wait for
        time - the maximum time to wait
        unit - the time unit of the time argument
        Returns:
        false if the waiting time detectably elapsed before return from the method, else true
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
